name: cost_option
description: The costs of a service at certain points in time. This is an LGA Extension. This object provides a structured version of the text information contained in the 'fees' field of the 'service' object.

id.name: id
id.title: Identifier
id.description: The identifier for the cost option. Each entry must have a unique identifier

service_id.name: service_id
service_id.title: Service Identifier
service_id.description: The identifier of the services for which the entry describes the cost.

valid_from.name: valid_from
valid_from.title: Valid From
valid_from.description: The date when this price is valid from.

valid_to.name: valid_to
valid_to.title: Valid To
valid_to.description: The date when this price is valid to.

option.name: option
option.title: Option
option.description: Conditions associated with the cost option.

amount.name: amount
amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The cost of the option, expressed as an amount.

amount_description.name: amount_description
amount_description.title: Amount Description
amount_description.description: Specific details qualifying the cost amount.
